name: SustainabilityTips
0:
”Alexa, open Sustainability Tips”
”Alexa, start Sustainability Tips”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sustainability tips
des:
Sustainability can be overwhelming and discouraging when looking at a list of 100+ things to change. Start by simply choosing one doable item to change every couple of weeks. This skill gives you tips on how to save resources (and money) from 6 main categories: energy, water, home, shopping, environment, and community. 

One tip doesn't apply or isn't doable for you at that moment? Just ask Alexa again! There are a variety of tips with facts and advice to choose from, each was made to be as realistic as possible. 

Please feel free to leave feedback on what you liked, disliked, and things to improve.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
